title: Classical Music
description: Learn the techniques and repertoire of classical music, including compositions from famous classical composers.

title: Pop Singing Workshop
description: Develop your vocal skills specifically for pop music genres. Learn performance techniques, vocal control, and style.

title: Jazz Music Ensemble
description: Join a jazz ensemble to practice and perform various jazz standards. Open to instrumentalists and vocalists.

title: Music Theory Fundamentals
description: Learn the essential elements of music theory, including notation, rhythm, scales, and harmony.

title: Vocal Technique and Performance
description: Develop your singing skills through vocal exercises, breath control, and stage presence. Suitable for all levels.
